title: Need help updating a company database and finding new companies
snippet:
Hi there - looking for an experienced web researcher that has completed projects identifying , extracting, and inputting data for large companies (1,000+ employees). 

Will need you to confirm and update the below data for 1000s of companies:
- Exact number of employees
- Headquarters address (city, state, zip, country)
- Industry
- Last year's revenue

Will also need to do research to ensure subsidiary companies are linked to their parent account. 

If interested, apply and you will complete a quick test assignment for skill assessment.
